function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation leading to airborne transmission of infectious agents","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for patients, healthcare workers, and visitors","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and air purifiers, and maintaining proper air pressure differentials","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI)","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate containment measures leading to spread of viruses between spaces","Impact":"Involuntary exposure of visitors, healthcare workers, and other patients","Mitigation":"Implementing effective containment measures such as anterooms and negative pressure differentials","Technologies":"Negative pressure rooms, anterooms","People":"Visitors, healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Trade-offs between safety and cost in healthcare facility design","Impact":"Increased costs and reduced visual barriers among medical care teams and patients","Mitigation":"Careful consideration of operational protocols and designs to balance safety and cost","Technologies":"NA","People":"Healthcare facility management, architects, designers","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
